title: Argo CD applications
subtitle: Creating and deploying applications on the OpenShift cluster by using the Argo CD dashboard, oc tool, or GitOps CLI.

abstract.para: This document provides instructions for creating and deploying your applications to the OpenShift cluster by using the Argo CD dashboard, oc tool, or GitOps CLI. It also discusses how to verify the self-healing behavior in Argo CD and how to enable and manage the application resources in non-control plane namespaces.
